tag_list: dan-ellis, fantastic-me, syndero, adteractive, customer-acquisition, social-commerce, drtv, home-shopping
overview:
Dan is a entrepreneur in the consumer Internet space. He is the founder and CEO of Fantastic.me, a social commerce company focused on fan-sourced designs for sports, entertainment, and gaming brands.

Previously, he co-founded his first company, Syndero, at the age of 24. Over 5 years and raising $10M in Venture Capital, Syndero grew to over $80 million in revenue profitably, selling subscription-based products direct to consumers online and offline through DRTV and home shopping. In 2009, Syndero was named the #1 Fastest Growing Company in the Bay Area by the SF Business Times.

Dan started his career the online performance marketing space as the first employee at Adteractive, where he developed online customer acquisition and lead generation products.
